Articles.Content:
Note: This craft requires the Firespitter pack. Find it on Kerbal Space Port here.

Introducing the first commercially available vehicle from JTech Industries, the Woodcock Mk.2!

Our boys down in the Atmospheric Flight Research division have been hard at work to bring you this beauty of a craft. It's a low altitude, low speed, long distance craft for recreational flights all across Kerbin. It features an impressive wingspan in a bi-plane configuration for maximum lift, allowing low cruise speeds, high fuel efficiency, and incredibly stable flight. Driven by just two FS1PE propeller engines, chances are you won't be needing to fuel up too often. It doesn't have any avionics, but the boys in the AFR division tell me a drunken house cat could fly this thing.

Download here.

Flight Notes:

  • Capable of takeoff at speeds as low as 30m/s
  • We recommend sticking to roughly 1/3 throttle @ <800m
  • Recommended cruising speed is between 50m/s and 70m/s
  • Recommended cruising altitude is <1000m
  • It's a tail-dragger, so careful when braking

PS: Yes, it has a helicopter cockpit. That just happened to fit my design best.
